 ## 2.4.0

 ## v2.2.1
 * Changed globalconfig version to a non-existent version so that apps can override samplePercent per application

 ## v2.2.0
 * Added logging for grpc connections and execution, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3876

## v2.1.4
* Fix: opentelemetry uses undefined or previous provider instance, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3983
* Fix: instruments should be re-used between configuration changes as it can patch the modules only once, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3983

## v2.0.0
* Added support to add new instruments via config
* Removed sync config load that blocks the main thread for 1+ seconds
* Added support to re-init tracer via config change to enable/disable or change its properties
* getTracer is non-blocking sync based on "enabled" flag from tracing configuration
* isEnabled is non-blocking sync
* getTracer and isEnabled are non-blocking to avoid blocking requests for 30 seconds in case of pending shutdown due to config changes
* Added @opentelemetry/instrumentation-graphql in disabled state for graphql services to activate if needed

## v1.3.2
* Added: Indicate Sampled state on CAL logs with TraceId + SpanId, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3929
